profile.edit_profile_text: You can edit your profile there but you will have then to indicate your password and confirm it to apply.
profile.email_button_tooltip: Click to be able to modify email address, and read instructions to apply update process.
profile.email_correct_error: Please choose a valid email syntax
profile.email_helper: In case of email modification, youwill receipt an email in this mail box with a link to confirm within 2 days to apply update changed.
profile.username_correct_error: username should be unique and up to 3 chars long.
profile.username_helper: Your username can be used to login, then choose a nice one and write it on your private notebook.
profile.first_name_correct_error: Your first name should be acceptable.
profile.second_name_correct_error: Your second name should be acceptable.
profile.password_button_tooltip: Click to be able to update your password, then follow instructions to apply update.
profile.password_helper: Password doesn't print for safety reason. You can modify it by first click the button upper...

fire_dialog.email_change_text:
You can edit email, but you will have to click to the link receipt on the new email box within 2 days to apply the new email changed

An email will be sent to the old email to signal the edition with a link to cancel the change.
